greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Constant term in the expansion of ((Sum_{k=-3..3} x^k) * (Sum_{k=-3..3} y^k) - (Sum_{k=-2..2} x^k) * (Sum_{k=-2..2} y^k))^n.
comment: Also number of n-step closed paths (from origin to origin) in 2-dimensional lattice, using steps (t_1,t_2) (|t_1| + |t_2| = 6).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500 (terms 0..230 from Vaclav Kotesovec)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Nov 04 2019
